General.Name: Sondotécnica Engenharia de Solos S.A
General.Description: Sondotécnica Engenharia de Solos S.A. provides various engineering services and solutions in Brazil and internationally. The company's services include preliminary and viability studies; master plans; basic and executive designs; construction supervision and inspection; project and construction management; privatization and concessions modeling; preparation and coordination of environmental studies and technical support in obtaining the license necessary for the deployment and operation of projects; inspection of manufacturing, technical specification, and assembly of structures; pre-operational testing and commissioning; and technical support and construction supervision. It also provides study, planning, administration, supervision, and delivery of engineering works. The company offers its services for projects in the transport, sanitation, housing, urbanization, energy, environment, irrigation, and industry fields. Sondotécnica Engenharia de Solos S.A. was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua VoluntArios da PAtria, 45, Rio De Janeiro, RJ, Brazil, 22270-900
